Package main

Interface Summary
Callback An interface for a generic callback class.
DatabaseRow  
 

Class Summary
AdSearchCallback This is where the user can query the database for ads.
CreateUserCallback This is where new users can create a new account and login to the system.
Database This singleton class handles the database connection.
ExitCallback Returns the back command.
ListCallback This is where the user can list the ads they have written.
LoginCallback This is where users who already are registered can login to the system.
LoginReviewCallback Shows the user a list of their reviews.
LogoutCallback Returns the back command and logs the user out of the system.
Main Main function to start the program.
Menu Creates a generic menu.
MenuCallback Calls a generic menu.
Options Used by a menu.
PageView Abstract class to handle a page.
PostCallback This is where the user can post an ad.
Review Holds data for a review
SearchAd Holds data for an Ad when user searches for ads
User This singleton class handles the user information.
UserAd Holds data for an Ad when user lists their ads
UserData Holds data for a user from the users table.
UserSearchCallback This is where the user can query the database for users.
